content.question: Dr. Guarini is interested in conducting research that examines how much information people can hold in their working memory. She is unsure whether she needs to conduct an experiment or correlational research. Experimental research differs from correlational research in that experimental research can do which of the following?

choices.label: defines the strength of the relation

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
